descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
🦎 You wake up inside a ritual. 🦎
💥 This is a world built to break — only physics, instinct, and violence.
🧱 Grab the stone and smash. 🪓 Grab the axe and slash. 💀
Somewhere in this mess, a princess is tied to a cruel ritual — once again.
Save her, or don’t.
The world won’t care.

This is Episode One.
More places and weirder weapons coming.
Enemies get stranger too.

[media]
# 🌀 Telekinesis

Use your bracers to rip stones from walls and throw them into lizard faces.
Hit hard. 
Bodies fly. Columns break. Sacred ruins fall. 
[media]

# ✨ Physics Combat

Every stone is a weapon.
If you can lift it, you can use it.
If you can throw it, you can kill with it.
You can cut limbs too.

[media]
# 🏛️ The Place
Ancient desert.
An Egyptian temple lost in sand.
More awaits you.

[media]

# 🌀 Telekinesis

Use your bracers to rip stones from walls and throw them into lizard faces.
Hit hard. 
Bodies fly. Columns break. Sacred ruins fall. 
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491821653_627063290476236_1484940024017118217_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vZc9ykI1LhMQ7kNvwGvnUre&_nc_oc=AdlJbeJojwXLzAN7GYzr-AWVPNnqrSKHV3OrigDR8IvkBP4M42O8VH0IRGZg6jv_5oY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfucNIv1QKdaQsBB-SfcXFFboT2h5Y1ZIYRq76xOrfMU1g&oe=69949E28)

# ✨ Physics Combat

Every stone is a weapon.
If you can lift it, you can use it.
If you can throw it, you can kill with it.
You can cut limbs too.
